name: Labradorite Necklace from 'Pearls for Bad Girls'
description:
Labrador, where this stone comes from, is a challenging place. Not for the faint of heart with its cold winters and bitter winds coming in off the Atlantic. The grey colouring in the sone reflects the colour of the sea on a cold morning as it drives against the rocky shore. When it catches the light, the refractions of the stone’s cleavages shine a startling royal blue. 

There you sit, composed as always. Soft contours of your flesh are not repeated in your eyes. The warmth you show him at night is only part of you, the depths that he has not yet seen are as grey and unpredictable as the sea. You can be soothing, accommodating and nurturing. But everyone knows you should never turn your back on the sea. 

This string from ‘Pearls for Bad Girls’ is made of labradorite strung on royal blue thread. It is hand knotted and finished with a silver lobster clasp. It measures 18 inches. Similar strings can be made to order on request.

Each string of Pearls for Bad Girls is sent to you packaged in a sensible box and includes the unique story for the particular stone. The aura of assured coolness that emanates from the wearer of a Pearls for Bad Girls necklace is entirely generated by the awesomeness of yourself, intertwined with the stones. 

Good girls get all the press, bad girls have all the fun.

name: Cherry Creek Jasper Necklace from 'Pearls for Bad Girls'
description:
You walk beneath the cloud of blushing blossoms, your feet leaving curious mottled green and brown trails in the carpet of petals. Now is the time for contemplation, to admire the transience and fragility. 

You watch as a child wanders through the grove. She is unaware of your scrutiny. Blossoms decorate her dark hair and she laughs and skips, enjoying the day. You could be sad - to think of your own girlhood - but this is not really a time for sadness. No stage of life is empty of joy, and you would not wish yourself back in time. 

You laugh too, softly, as you turn away, your step firm and regrets left behind in the trail of blossoms. 

This necklace is made of Cherry Creek Jasper and measures 18 inches long. It is finished with a silver lobster clasp. It is entirely painted by nature. Similar necklaces can be made to order.

Each string of Pearls for Bad Girls is sent to you packaged in a sensible box and includes the unique story for the particular stone. The aura of assured coolness that emanates from the wearer of a Pearls for Bad Girls necklace is entirely generated by the awesomeness of yourself, intertwined with the stones. 

Good girls get all the press, bad girls have all the fun.

name: Dumortierite Pearl Necklace from 'Pearls for Bad Girls' by Rachel Smith of senselessart
description:
You know that you are the backbone of the marriage. Without you to clothe and feed him, he would wither away as he writes his ‘Magnum Opus’ in his dusty study. You pause in your contemplations to listen as he starts out on one of his long, solitary walks. Entering his study, you find the usual chaos - papers and books on every surface, the tea cup half full of cold tea. 

You sigh and pick up his latest manuscript. They always need so much work and they seem to be getting worse of late. You hope his walk will be a long one, otherwise you will just have to finish it after he has fallen asleep tonight. You fill your pen with ink and begin to revise his ramblings into a semblance of meaning. 

Dumortierite is well know for its ability to stimulate and enhance intellectual capabilities. Who are you to pass up any kind of stimulation or enhancement? 

This string from ‘Pearls for Bad Girls’ is made of polished dumortierite pearls strung on purple thread. It is finished with a silver clasp. It is 19.5 inches long. Similar items can be made on request.

Each string of Pearls for Bad Girls is sent to you packaged in a sensible box and includes the unique story for the particular stone. The aura of assured coolness that emanates from the wearer of a Pearls for Bad Girls necklace is entirely generated by the awesomeness of yourself, intertwined with the stones. 

Good girls get all the press, bad girls have all the fun.

This item will be shipped via registered mail and will take 7 - 10 days to arrive.

name: Black Jade Anti-Pearls - From "Pearls for Bad Girls"
description:
You sit, demurely by the window, in your twinset and pearls, with the top button fastened. You look so sweet and innocent, nobody suspects what you are smiling about. The black Jade pearls around your neck do not shine to garner attention. They lurk, and wait, silently absorbing te energies and attitudes surrounding you. Only the planet blue of the Lapis Lazuli hidden in the string reveals your true ambition. 

Do you like pearls but have a darker side? Are you tired of the same old respectability? These pearls are for the beast inside, let her out for a little wander. 

Black Jade pearls hand knotted with on black thread with a single, perfect Lapis Lazuli pearl nestled among the matte black stones. The necklace is finished with a silver t-bar clasp. It measures 18 inches long.

Each string of Pearls for Bad Girls is sent to you packaged in a sensible box and includes the unique story for the particular stone. The aura of assured coolness that emanates from the wearer of a Pearls for Bad Girls necklace is entirely generated by the awesomeness of yourself, intertwined with the stones. 

Good girls get all the press, bad girls have all the fun.
